---
title: "`tinytable`"
---

```{r}
# library(tinytable)
devtools::document()
pkgload::load_all()
x <- mtcars[1:4, 1:4]
tt(x,
  html = htmlOptions(
    class = "table table-striped"),
  latex = latexOptions(
    theme = "plain",
    placement = "H",
    hlines = "dotted,fg=blue",
    vlines = "dashed,fg=red,wd=1pt")
)
```

```{r}
tt(x, latex = latexOptions(placement = "H"))
```
